EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

DerivativeNotionalAmount.label: Derivative, Notional Amount
DerivativeNotionalAmount.description: Aggregate notional amount specified by the derivative(s). Expressed as an absolute value.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and due within one year (or the operating cycle, if longer), including liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

AdministrativeFeesExpense.label: Administrative Fees Expense
AdministrativeFeesExpense.description: Amount of expense for administrative services provided to the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP) by the managing member or general partner, affiliate of managing member or general partner, or affiliate of LLC or LP, for example, but not limited to, salaries, rent, or overhead costs.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

AssetManagementCosts.label: Asset Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
AssetManagementCosts.description: The aggregate costs related to asset management during the reporting period.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityT.label: Business Acquisition, Transaction Costs
BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityT.description: Amount of direct costs of the business combination including legal, accounting, and other costs incurred to consummate the business acquisition.

CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.label: Capital Leased Assets, Gross
CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of leased physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.label: Capital Leases, Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Net
CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.description: The total gross amount less the charge for the use of the long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Five Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Four Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Three Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Two Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due Thereafter
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Accumulated Depreciation
CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.description: The total charge for the use of long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: The net investment in direct financing leases as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Deferred Income
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: The remaining (unamortized) difference between the gross investment in a direct financing lease and the cost or carrying amount, if different, of the leased property as of the balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Initial Direct Costs
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: Remaining unamortized costs as of the balance sheet date that were essential to acquiring the lease, and that would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred negotiating, processing, and closing the lease agreement.

CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.label: Capital Leases, Net Investment in Direct Financing Leases, Unguaranteed Residual Values of Leased Property
CapitalLeasesNetInvestmentInDirectFinanc.description: The estimate of the lease property's economic value at the end of the direct financing lease term excluding any amounts guaranteed by either the lessee or a third-party.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ContributionsFromNoncontrollingInterests.label: Contributions from Noncontrolling Interests (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ContributionsFromNoncontrollingInterests.description: Amount of cash inflow from contributions from noncontrolling interests in an investment.

CostMethodInvestments.label: Cost Method Investments
CostMethodInvestments.description: Amount, after adjustment, of cost-method investment. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, dividends received in excess of earnings after date of investment that are considered a return of investment and other than temporary impairments.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate.description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: Effective interest rate for the funds borrowed under the debt agreement considering interest compounding and original issue discount or premium.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage Rate Range, Maximum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: When presenting a range of interest rates, the highest effective rate for funds borrowed under the debt agreement as of the balance sheet date.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage Rate Range, Minimum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: When presenting a range of interest rates, the lowest effective rate for funds borrowed under the debt agreement as of the balance sheet date.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage Rate Range, Maximum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Maximum contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage Rate Range, Minimum (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
DebtInstrumentInterestRateStatedPercenta.description: Minimum contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

DeconsolidationGainOrLossAmount.label: Deconsolidation, Gain (Loss), Amount
DeconsolidationGainOrLossAmount.description: Amount of gain (loss) from deconsolidation of subsidiary and derecognition of group of assets constituting transfer of business or nonprofit activity, excluding conveyance of oil and gas mineral rights and transfer of good or service in contract with customer.

DeferredCostsCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Deferred Costs
DeferredCostsCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: The carrying amount of deferred costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsGross.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross
DeferredFinanceCostsGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwards.description: Amount, before allocation of a valuation allowances, of deferred tax assets attributable to deductible tax credit carryforwards including, but not limited to, research, foreign, general business, alternative minimum tax, and other deductible tax credit carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

Depreciation.label: Depreciation
Depreciation.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DerivativeAssets.label: Derivative Asset
DerivativeAssets.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Loss
DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.description: Amount of realized and unrealized loss of derivative instruments not designated or qualifying as hedging instruments.

DerivativeLiabilities.label: Derivative Liability
DerivativeLiabilities.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.label: Equity Method Investment, Realized Gain (Loss) on Disposal
EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of an equity method investment.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Net Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of net income (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Revenue (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of revenue from sale of product and rendering of service reported by equity method investee.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

FeesAndCommissionsOther.label: Fees and Commissions, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FeesAndCommissionsOther.description: Amount of fee and commission revenue classified as other.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.label: Financing Receivable, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.description: Amount of financing receivable 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.label: Foreign Currency Transaction Gain (Loss), Unrealized
ForeignCurrencyTransactionGainLossUnreal.description: Amount before tax of foreign currency transaction unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments, Net, Pretax
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets for Financial Service Operations
GainsLossesOnSalesOfAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets utilized in financial service operations.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GeneralPartnerDistributions.label: General Partner Distributions
GeneralPartnerDistributions.description: Distributions from earnings to the general partner of a partnership included in the consolidated financial statements.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Recorded Investment
ImpairedFinancingReceivableRecordedInves.description: Amount of investment of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableUnpaidPrincip.description: Amount of unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables with related allowance for credit losses and without related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.label: Impaired Financing Receivable, with Related Allowance, Unpaid Principal Balance
ImpairedFinancingReceivableWithRelatedAl.description: Unpaid principal balance of impaired financing receivables for which there is a related allowance for credit losses.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfAsse.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Asset, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationDispositionOfAsse.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to disposition of asset. Includes, but is not limited to, intra-entity transfer of asset other than inventory.

IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationMinorityInterestI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Income Taxes
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredIncomeTaxes.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the account that represents the temporary difference that results from Income or Loss that is recognized for accounting purposes but not for tax purposes and vice versa.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromAffiliatesCurre.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Affiliates, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromAffiliatesCurre.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current receivables (due within one year or one operating cycle) to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedParties.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families; affiliates; or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInInterestAndDividendsRe.label: Increase (Decrease) in Interest and Dividends Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInInterestAndDividendsRe.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount due to the entity in the form of unpaid interest and dividends.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthor.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Authorized
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsAuthor.description: The number of limited partner units authorized to be issued.

LineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit
LineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LineOfCreditFacilityAmountOutstanding.label: Line of Credit Facility, Amount Outstanding (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LineOfCreditFacilityAmountOutstanding.description: Amount borrowed under the credit facility as of the balance sheet date.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.description: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

LineOfCreditFacilityRemainingBorrowingCa.label: Line of Credit Facility, Remaining Borrowing Capacity
LineOfCreditFacilityRemainingBorrowingCa.description: Amount of borrowing capacity currently available under the credit facility (current borrowing capacity less the amount of borrowings outstanding).

LineOfCreditFacilityUnusedCapacityCommit.label: Line of Credit Facility, Unused Capacity, Commitment Fee Percentage
LineOfCreditFacilityUnusedCapacityCommit.description: The fee, expressed as a percentage of the line of credit facility, for available but unused credit capacity under the credit facility.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncome.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncome.description: Amount of deferred interest and fee income, unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncomeCo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Deferred Income, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableDeferredIncomeCo.description: Reflects the cumulative amount of interest and fees paid by commercial loan borrowers which have not yet been taken into income in conformity with GAAP. Also reflects the amount of unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of acquired loans which have been classified as commercial loans by the entity and that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, after Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Percentage Rate
LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.description: The interest rate applicable to the portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

MinorityInterestIncreaseFromStockIssuanc.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Equity Issuance or Sale of Parent Equity Interest (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
MinorityInterestIncreaseFromStockIssuanc.description: Represents an increase in noncontrolling interest from issuance of additional equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders or the sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTy.label: Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases
NetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTy.description: The net amount due as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOf.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Sale of Parent Equity Interest
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSaleOf.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from sale of a portion of the parent's controlling interest.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

NonRecourseDebt.label: Non-Recourse Debt
NonRecourseDebt.description: Amount of debt for which creditor does not have general recourse to the debtor but rather has recourse only to the property used for collateral in the transaction or other specific property.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNonc.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

NumberOfInterestRateDerivativesHeld.label: Number of Interest Rate Derivatives Held
NumberOfInterestRateDerivativesHeld.description: Number of interest rate derivative instruments held by the entity at the reporting date.

OfferingCostsPartnershipInterests.label: Offering Costs, Partnership Interests
OfferingCostsPartnershipInterests.description: Costs incurred in connection with the offering and selling of additional partner interest.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueF.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Future Minimum Sublease Rentals
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueF.description: Contractually required future rental payments receivable on noncancelable subleasing arrangements.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Current
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other liabilities.

OtherNoncashIncome.label: Other Noncash Income
OtherNoncashIncome.description: Amount of income or gain included in net income that result in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

PaidInKindInterest.label: Paid-in-Kind Interest
PaidInKindInterest.description: Interest paid other than in cash for example by issuing additional debt securities. As a noncash item, it is added to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountSaleOfUnits.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.label: Partners' Capital Account, Treasury Units, Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.description: Value of units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSaleOfUnits.description: Total units issued during the year due to the sale of units. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAllocatedForIncomeTaxAndO.label: Partners' Capital Allocated for Income Tax and Other Withdrawals
PartnersCapitalAllocatedForIncomeTaxAndO.description: Amount of partnership capital allocated for income tax and other withdrawals.

PartnersCapitalAttributableToNoncontroll.label: Partners' Capital Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
PartnersCapitalAttributableToNoncontroll.description: Total of all Partners' Capital (deficit) items which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest).

PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.label: Partners' Capital, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
PartnersCapitalIncludingPortionAttributa.description: Amount of partners' capital (deficit), including portions attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

PaymentsForCommissions.label: Payments for Commissions
PaymentsForCommissions.description: The amount of cash paid for commissions during the current period.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Other Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash outflow to reacquire equity classified as other.

PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense.label: Payments for Underwriting Expense
PaymentsForUnderwritingExpense.description: Cash paid for expenses incurred during underwriting activities (the process to review insurance applications, evaluate risks, accept or reject applications, and determine the premiums to be charged) for insurance companies.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireInterestInJointVenture.label: Payments to Acquire Interest in Joint Venture
PaymentsToAcquireInterestInJointVenture.description: The cash outflow associated with the investment in or advances to an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group.

PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.label: Payments to Acquire Limited Partnership Interests
PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.

PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.label: Payments to Acquire Machinery and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow to acquire an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the entity (holder) a definite sum of money at a future date. Such amount may include accrued interest receivable in accordance with the terms of the note. The note also may contain provisions including a discount or premium, payable on demand, secured, or unsecured, interest bearing or noninterest bearing, among myriad other features and characteristics.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLeaseReceivables.label: Proceeds from Collection of Lease Receivables
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLeaseReceivables.description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of receivables arising from the lease of real estate, equipment or other fixed assets for a specified time in exchange for payment, usually in the form of rent; excludes proceeds from sales-type lease transactions, which are classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.label: Proceeds from Collection of Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromCollectionOfNotesReceivable.description: The cash inflow associated with principal collections from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInConso.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Consolidated Subsidiaries
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInConso.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or the sale of investment in consolidated subsidiaries (generally greater than 50 percent).

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInJoint.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Joint Venture
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInJoint.description: The cash inflow from the sale of an investment interest in a joint venture that the reporting entity has not previously accounted for using consolidation or the equity method of accounting.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Subsidiaries and Affiliates
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInSubsi.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or sale of an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfInterestInPartnershipU.label: Proceeds from Sale of Interest in Partnership Unit
ProceedsFromSaleOfInterestInPartnershipU.description: The proceeds from the sale of an interest in a unit of partnership.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Machinery and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash inflow from sale of machinery and equipment.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherPropertyPlantAndE.description: Amount of cash inflow for the sale of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of accumulated depreciation, by major property class, recorded on property subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Gross
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services subject to or available for lease.

PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.label: Property Subject to or Available for Operating Lease, Net
PropertySubjectToOrAvailableForOperating.description: The amount of property, by major property class, net of accumulated depreciation, subject to or available for lease as of the balance sheet date.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RetainageDeposit.label: Retainage Deposit
RetainageDeposit.description: The amount of assets, typically cash, provided to suppliers of goods in advance of receipt and acceptance, or services (such as research facilities, lawyers or consultants), which is held by such parties until the entity either effects full payment (including applying the retainer) or obtains release from liability.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SignificantAcquisitionsAndDisposalsAcqui.label: Significant Acquisitions and Disposals, Acquisition Costs or Sale Proceeds (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
SignificantAcquisitionsAndDisposalsAcqui.description: The value of all consideration given or received by the Entity in the significant acquisition or disposal.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Amount
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesBalance.description: Amount of valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Additions, Charge to Other Account
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesChargedToO.description: Amount of increase in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves from charge to accounts other than cost and expense.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Deduction
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesDeductions.description: Amount of decrease in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
